content.detailedDescription: My wife and i are smokers so we went outside to smoke a cigarette. she immediately said "what the hell is that?" i have nothing in the mental rolodex to identify this object against, hence the reason i am actually taking the time to post this. this interaction freaked us out and i can't come up with a good reason for what we witnessed. it moved front/back side to side and vertically up and down instantly. i know spacial awareness can play tricks on the mind ... i don't think this was that. the object seemed large and fast and changed directions on a dime. if it were some type of remote vehicle, considering how bright and how big and how fast it was, if it were rc i would have heard something. i flew rc as kid and am familiar with even extreme rc. this was freaky and unlike anything i've ever seen. my wife and i couldn't stop talking about it. if it wasn't something i could explain away (which is my inclination) i wouldn't have taken the time to post it here. i'm hoping you can tell me i saw something normal ....
content.summary: Unknown blue/red lights on chaotic trajectory

content.detailedDescription: Our home looks to the east with a 25 mile view. i noticed what i thought was a aircraft directly to the east from midway/heber out hwy 40. it was stationary on the horizon so i thought it was coming towards me. i'm a private pilot. i looked out the window about 15 minutes later and it was in the same place. i thought then it might be the iss; however, i looked it up online and saw it was over the indian ocean at that time. it was shining very brightly with what appeared to be blinking green, red and yellow lights in no particular order. i then thought it must be some other type low orbit vehicle reflecting the sun with the atmosphere causing the color variations. i took both photos and video of it with my canon 7d 70-200 f2.8 is lens but it was just too far away to make anything out. did you receive other reports or know what it was. i would be curious. thanks.
content.summary: What appeared to be a stationary blinking object in orbit

content.detailedDescription: I and my wife siting on our door step i see them i begin to count the numb13 ufos since 1978 i have look for them  orbs that shift shape like fixwing or    someing like it how i feel my frist letting mufon no it 1978 gave me fath?     they flew out ne looks like they wer parting haveing fun man.
content.summary: my frist sight happen 1978 well they are all different the numb 13who  13 incredb orbs                l

content.detailedDescription: We (4 of us) notice object heading south from harlingen while we were out playing golf, at first we thought it was a helo or airplane but as it got closer to our location we could clearly see that it was not an aircraft of any type or drone. it made no noise, it just hovered above for a few minutes then it disappeared, flew straight up, no engine noise nothing. the object did not have any marking, wing, rotors, etc., and it was no weather balloon or what have you. i am attaching the pictures i took with my camera, if you zoom into the object it is no airplane. this incident happened around 1300 and lasted for about 20 minutes or so..............At first we thought it was a helo or aircraft, we even thought it was a balloon or a bird but as it got closer we noticed that it was nothing that we have seen before. and no we were not drinking..............
content.summary: Flying slowly south.

content.detailedDescription: 4:45 pm el cajon ca nov 11 2013, saw a cluster of 5 very bright lights quarter circle the moon, then leave the moon and fairly fast, just dissolve. i was at my home and just happened to look up.The only thing it could have been is a cluster of balloons, but the 5 pieces stayed stationary within itself, they looked like bright lights, they were very far away, and the circled, then changed direction and disappeared.
content.summary: Cluster of 5 very bright lights half circled moon then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i hop in her truck to leave my house and go get some taco bell! we pull to the end of my driveway which is crossed by rt 116. which is pretty busy for a road around here. i look to the sky directly in front of me above the field across the street, and i saw a star in the sky, but for some reason i continued to stare for a moment. when all of a sudden its light intensified by at least 10x! then it slowly faded out into a barely visible, faint orangish/red glow, it slowly began moving left, i began to wonder if maybe this was just an airplane and my eyes playing tricks on me. but as it moved left it stopped, and begin to go right, right back the way it came!I was shocked...This isnt a plane i thought to myself. i get out of the vehichle,standing at the end of my driveway as all these cars pass by, just staring at the sky! it moved back and forth left to right a good 2-3 times, the whole time moving across the sky in a parabola formation as a whole but along its path it would do almost circular loops to my perspective. none of this seemed fast i should mention. almost as if it were gliding, or more ressembled to a leaf being blown in a light autumn breeze! just creepy! i hope its just something known, i just dont know! any help of anything in that airspace at the time would be appreciated! i like to be logical and realistic, but i do believe!
content.summary: Odd light moving in opposite directions!

content.detailedDescription:
We just back from late shopping. it was after dark. i'm not sure about the hour. my girl and i went out of the car and catch bags when i saw the object (s?). now i think that it followed abowe train line nearby. i sow it moving for about 1 km from stary kisielin village to zielona g���ra obove the train line- i think. there were somethink really unnatural in this light. i saw this for les than 30 seconds. i looked twice at this something. i remember it was cold that day. 
i don't understand some of your questions. english is not my foreign language.
content.summary: Strange orange-red light s 5 in a row moving in a line like frozen

content.detailedDescription: I was with my girlfriend (at 40 she hates to be called a girl) in fredericksburg, virginia about 7:40pm on saturday, november 9, 2013.  she went out on her second floor balcony to have a smoke and in a matter of seconds she called me how to ask me what type of light that was in the sky.  the light was very and i do mean very bright and at about 40 degrees in the sky (at 220 degrees sw from our location) visible over some trees and another apartment building.  at first i thought that it looked just like the bright white light that is on the front of large passenger planes. the biggest problems with that explanation is that it would have had to be within a mile of our location and flying lower that 750 (approx) feet in order to be that size and bright.  the thing was it didn't appear to be moving, there was no sound and it was not accompanied by the flashing red light that is always on the underside of all large aircraft.  together we watched the light for about 10 minutes and finally noticed that it was now lower in the sky (about 30 degrees). this change was so slow that if we hadn't compared it to the trees and the other buildings, we would have never noticed that it had moved at all.  i tried my best to come up with an explanation as to what this might could be but nothing seemed to fit.  i thought that maybe it was a large plane that was flying directly away from us and that's why it didn't move from side to side, but the size never really changed abd i just how slow could it go in order to appear to not be moving at all.  it was way to bright to be a star or planet.  i thought about a radio or cell tower, but the light did eventually go lower and eventually disappear.  the i remembered about the goce satelite that was suppose to be falling back to earth in a couple of days, but everything that i read said that the satelite always had a tail and would blink, this light had or did neither.  i also thought about the iss, but upon looking it up on the nasa website, it was traversing the sky in the wrong direction. it lasted or was visible for about 40 minutes. i'm not saying what it was for i have no idea. if anyone has the answer i be very thankful for any legitimate answeres.
content.summary: Very bright light if moving, it was very slow but appeared to disappear over the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
As i was driving eastbound on the trans canada highway, toward montreal, soon after the 2 mountains bridge, still in the sainte-anne-de-bellevue township, very close to but just barely passed the address 21025 trans canada highway, when at about 11:40 pm, to my left looking north, i saw 3 lights forming a perfect triangle standing upright, 1 on top and 2 at the bottom.

i was driving east doing around 100km per hour in the left lane. after a few seconds, the 3 lights began to rotate slowly and then it looked as though the entire formation moved from upright to flat, meaning that the top light of the triangle was now facing me (the road) and the 2 others that were at the bottom were on the same level on either side of the top light forming a straight horizontal path so, it then looked like 3 lights lined-up in a horizontal row: one on the left, one in the middle and the third on the right. 

the 3 lights were moving in unison so it got even stranger when the middle light broke away from what seemed like a solid structure (but did not see anything holding them together), and moved to the right (flying east), passing the light on the right and fly away with some distance from the other 2 who remained immobile for about 2 or 3 seconds. at that point, the other 2 immobile lights started to follow the first one in the same eastbound direction. all 3 seamed to be flying at the same speed i was (approx. 100km p/h) and in less than a minute later, the "leading" light faded out to black or nothing, just disappeared slowly a bit like when you shut off a light using the slide on a dimmer. then, about 2 seconds later the other 2 lights following it just blinked-out, no fading-out but suddenly, then nothing in the sky. gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Night sighting. 3 glowing white orbs in triangle formation, hovering then rotated in unison, then one light separated from group and flew east and other 2 followed and then first light faded out and the other 2 blinked-out a second later.

content.detailedDescription: At 7:44 pm arizona time, i exited my apartment to the west. when i reached the parking lot i immediately turned to the left (south) and witnessed a very large glowing object streaking across the sky from south towards the southwest. the object left a sizable trail and was the largest object i have ever seen streaking through the sky. it had some characteristics of the recent russion meteor but the object i observed travelled slower and had a larger main body. it disappeared out of sight behind another building.
content.summary: Very large fireball like object streaking through sky

content.detailedDescription:
My adult son and his friend were outside in front of the house when they saw a very large triangular craft in the sky. at first only two very bright orange lights were visable. soon after there were three and they realized the craft was tumbling. they followed it in the car for about a mile before it went out of sight. it was traveling ne from tomball tx at 9:20 pm. on 11/08/13. they took video on an i phone. this was seen by many people in the subdevision. we live in the flight path of iah and are familiar with plane traffic. this was not an airplane. it was aprox. 600 ft
and about as tall as a 747, dark in color.
content.summary: Tumbling triangle w 3 lights aprox 600 ft. video on iphone

content.detailedDescription:
Appx. 9:30 p.M. local time looked straight up and saw the black triangular shaped object moving across my field of view from nnw to sse ( from the area of eglin afb). the craft moved in a straight line across field of view for 10 seconds. constant dull lights on the bottom. dead silent vehicle.
i've always stared at the sky my whole life and am familiar with military aircraft so i was quite thrilled to see this ufo/ new military hardware. based on the daily flight patterns of military jets taking off out of eglin, this object pretty much headed in the same direction and no jets were in pursuit of the craft.
content.summary: Looked striaght up, saw black silent tringular craft heading nnw to sse

content.detailedDescription: I have witnessed a triangle shaped aircraft. it was quite some time ago but i remember it like it was yesterday.  it was 1999. i was at a friend's apartment. it was in beaverton, oregon, murray hill area. it was around 7 or 8 pm. it was dusk. my friend and i were aware of several triangle shaped aircraft flying around at fairly high altitude. i felt quite a bit of fear while they were up there. they were up flying around above us for probably a couple of hours. i then decided to walk out to the back patio. i looked up and saw a large, nearly black triangle shaped craft. it had rounded corners. it was silent. was moving at approximately 20 miles per hour. i looked at it for about 10 to 15 seconds and was extremely scared and went back inside the house. i vaguely remember my friend talking about contacting the newspaper to let them know about this but they wanted nothing to do with it. do you know of anyone else in the murray hill area that has also seen these strange aircraft?
content.summary: I walked out on the patio, looked up and saw a dark gray triangle shaped craft.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a paranormal investigator, my teammate frank and i were on our way back from a client reveal. we were on route 28 south, in epsom, nh. we were just talking about how things went that evening when i noticed 2 lights in the sky, as we drove, i noticed a third light. they were in a line. they seemed to be white/silver/red tint. it reminded me of the tops of a radio towers (for aircraft) i thought they may be sone kind of copter, but there were no flashing aircraft lights. 
the 3 lights seemed to be evenly spaced and traveling northwest. we did not stop and take photos. i noticed the lights in the distance over the trees, as we drove they got closer. i am not sure of the altitiude of these lights. they passed over us, or were traveling quickly over us. i had my car window open but did not hear any sound. i kept looking in the mirrors to see them again, but after about a half a mile, they were gone. 
the lights seemed round in shape, no shape changing, no lights getting closer to eachother, they stayed evenly spaced. i am not sure what these lights were, could they have been some kind of lights attached to a balloon, flares, something along that line. i was very interested as to what these lights were, just as in a paranormal investigation. my teammate and i did talk about these lights for the remainder of our ride. we can not explain what we saw.  

thank you
eric metzler
content.summary: 3 lights, evenly spaced, white silver

content.detailedDescription: Going to bed i noticed aglow in the sky, it was cloudy but the light shone through the clouds, it was static for a few seconds then moved at speed out of view. after twenty seconds it appeared again in the same place, another one came a distance away,then both moved in different directions before appearing again. this went on for four times.
content.summary: Bright light in sky then rapid movement then appeared again, with another one a distance away

content.detailedDescription: Around 2 am i laid in bed but couldn't realy sleep as it was too warm. the bedroom was located in the basement, having big windows facing the yard. i opened my eyes amd saw a bright greenish light, maybe a beam, enlightening the yard. the light was brighter than the usual spot located in the yard and it had a different light color (the actual halogen spot is not green). somehow it didn't seem to bother me and i felt to be at odds with myself whether i should get up and have a look out off the window or to get out off the house. in someway i also felt like i wasn't really able to move amd i closed my eyes again. after about 1 minute i got scared to death when the light disappeared but a noise i've never heard before come from over the house. it was a growling,  roaring and rumbling noise that went through my bones and went from a deep sound to a higher and higher sound as the thing liftet off. i still wasn't able to move and shocked deeply. after some 10 minutes later i heard the same noise again. this time it sounded like it was a couple of streets away. the same roaring with the same lift off sound. after that weekend, i told a colleague about it and he told me that he read something in a forum from a guy who wrote that he had seen something glowing and hovering over the village where i was that night, but i couldn't and can't find his entry. if anybody could tell me what it was that i saw and heared, if anybody could approve this happening it would really ease my life as i've been dealing with this for 7 years now.
content.summary: Ufo hovering over house (soundless), green light beam enlightening yard, take off without light but loud noise

content.detailedDescription: Just pulled into work when i noticed a glowing orb type object moving slowly and silently toward the gulf of mexico. i work at a beach hotel. i ran up to the top of the garage, three stories high, and watched it continue moving out over the water until it disappeared. then as turned to go into work, facing south east, i noticed another orange light moving the same way but it seemed to be coming from a different trajectory, but heading in the same direction as the other one until it too disappeared over the gulf of mexico.
content.summary: Two orange orbs

content.detailedDescription:
On november 8th my husband made an offhand comment that he thought he had seen a ufo the previous night.  coming from him, i was shocked because he had never said anything like that.  he explained that the previous night he had been outside talking on the phone since the reception was better out there.  the sky was very clear and he saw a bright object that at first he thought was a star or a planet but as he watched it over the next hour he realized it would move very slightly but continued to shine.  i couldn't believe he hadn't come to show me!  since we live right next to ft. bragg i reasoned it was some military aircraft but he is a former marine and said it didn't look like that and had no sound.  i was joking and said maybe it will be back tonight.  we looked outside after sun set, about 7:15 pm -- and it was there.  we got my daughter's play binoculars and i watched it.  this was nov. 8th.  it was a very bright white round light.  as i watched it, it remained in almost the exact same spot without decreasing in size.  it looked like a bright star but it seemed to turn slowly and a red light could be seen briefly.  it was just above the treeline whereas the night before it had been high in the sky.  i couldn't figure out how it could stay in the same place for that long moving only slowly up or down but not basically moving.  it disappeared after about an hour.  it was back tonight, the 10th, but back up high in the sky.  i wish someone could tell me what it is because i've never seen anything like it.  i have lived next to bragg for years and i'm used to planes flying in and out, but this is something different.
i have never given much thought to ufos but once i saw this i felt perplexed.
content.summary: Large bright star-like object hovering in the sky for over an hour

content.detailedDescription:
Was stationed working outside at one of the job locations. my back was turned towards the 2 orbs at first but a co-worker noticed these two "star like" objects were moving. i looked up and saw that these objects almost appeared star like, having a white glow but had what looked like orange-ish red flashing lights. what made it not star like was how these lights stopped and moved in the sky. at first there were only 2 moving lights but a 3rd appeared out of no where. eventually there was only one which eventually disappeared a few minutes later. total sighting lasted what appeared 15-20 minutes. orbs appeared to have energy field around them. like a circle that surrounded the actual lights. really weird. i've always believed that humans aren't the only intelligent life in this universe. after today i can say that i am 100% sure that what i saw was not a plane or anything from this world. helicopters arent known to be hovering at heights where planes are leaving chem trails. it wasnt a plane because if a plane stopped moving in the air it would most likely would free-fall towards earth. i've always wanted to see ufo's and today this finally happened. 

i have a video i took. i need to upload it and edit the beginning to mute the exact location stated in the video. i don't want any problems with my job. ill try to upload tomorrow or at a later time. 

eyes up, ears open. be safe everyone
content.summary: First 2 orange moving lights then 3 then 1 then none.

content.detailedDescription: I was just standing in my backyard one afternoon and looked up and saw a sliver craft moving from north to south.  it was pretty high and had no wings, made no noise. i thought it might be a balloon but seemed to be moving under its own power in a straight line.  it had a definite circular shape that i could see and it was metallic with a dome. i have attached a sketch of the shape.
content.summary: It was just slowly moving across the sky from north to south

content.detailedDescription: I rose to take my dog out to relieve herself at 5:00 am the morning of sunday 11/10/13. it was very cool, clear sky with many visible stars. while standing there i observed a singular bright light traveling towards us off in the distance to the southwest moving in a northeasterly direction until it passed overhead and continued on it's course. while i took note that it was brighter than satellites i've seen before (about as bright as jupiter), i initially didn't think anything of it & assumed in could have been the soce satellite or space station as it didn't blink and traveled slowly along a straight path as i've witnessed many satellites do on other occasions in the past. i continued standing outside with my dog in the still cold air for a few minutes after that and realized i was getting a very uncomfortable, uneasy feeling. it was very still and quiet. no wind or no traffic noise. i noticed my sleepy dog suddenly became anxious and then some doves roosting in one of the trees stirred and fluttered among the dry leaves. i turned in the direction of the tree and at that moment looked up over my shoulder and noticed a group of very distinct, faint lights traveling at a very fast rate of speed over my left shoulder which then moved directly away from me at a slight angle from where i stood. they left no visual trail behind but were clearly visible moving in unison. they appeared to be traveling in the exact opposite direction of the singular light i had previously observed. it was difficult to make out the exact shape or precise details but the 4-5 (or more) faint white lights appeared to remain in a constant relation to one another and moved away at a constant rate of speed and altitude. i didn't get the impression that they were extremely high in elevation (1000-1500 ft.) they did not appear in any way to be shooting stars or debris burning up in the atmosphere and traveled at too high a rate of speed to be any aircraft that i've ever seen before in my life. i was left with the impression that it was a singular object as the area between the lights appeared to be flat black or very dark grey. the entire event was over in 4-5 seconds before the lights faded out of view as they traveled away. it really creeped me out as i realized that with it's appearance, it could have been there all along motionless and i wouldn't have noticed it as it would have been concealed among the surrounding stars undetected. i just stood there for about a 30 seconds in shock questioning myself in disbelief until i finally gathered my thoughts and hurried back to the house.
content.summary: Cluster of fast moving lights in the sky overhead early morning while walking dog.

content.detailedDescription: My husband noticed it in the sky while he was in the bathroom.  he said november 9th to me "that is a funny looking star".   he went out to the back deck and i joined him.  i said that "that's an airplane".  will i kept looking and it would move up and down, and to the north and then to the south.  i went and got the camera.   my husband took pictures of the object .  i noticed it had blinking red lights at times and at times there would be green lights that would appear.  at times it would have a large bright white light.  it would finely go down to tree level and then disappeared.  my husband said it was over the big south fork national river, and was not any thing he has seen before.  the next night my husband went out to build a fire on the flat land across the street.  i looked out the kitchen window and saw it again.  i yelled to my husband it was back again.  i joined him at the fire with the camera.  we stood there and watched the same kind of object again, move up,and down, and from side to side.  mike took video this time.  we zoomed in with the camera and noticed it had three lights.  and one time i saw a plane (with blinking lights) approach it and looked like it was on top of it.  my husband took more video , and gave me the camera.  he went in the house and i took one more short video before it disappeared.  then i came in and decided to report our sighting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared like a star, then it would move up and down,it moved closer and then move away.  no noise,noted and stayed in area for about an hour before disappearing to the  southwest..

content.detailedDescription: I was going to the store on my byke and stopped on a corner to look both ways before crossing the street.When i looked to the right so i could cross and when i looked i saw in the sky the first orb lit up like a giant ball of light.I sort of froze because i already knew what i was looking at. so i just stood there and to my amazement they would appear from the right and one by one they all followed one another and came lower for a very short while moving to the left of me across the sky like being pulled on a giant string like giant pearls and they all shot upwards and they went so high i knew the were not helicopters or anything from here.After that i went to the store and when i came back i stood at the same place because i saw a plane at the same spot that i saw the orbs and i could tell the diference that what i saw was not a plane . i felt nerveous at the time of the sighting and called my roommate at the time while looking at these things.
content.summary: Going to the store on my byke i saw at night 6 sphere shaped ufos

content.detailedDescription:
I had observed other orange orbs earlier this year and posted pictures and descriptions here. my youngest daughter (19) came in the house around 6:50 pm to tell me they were back. when i went outside i did observe an light south of my location. it first appeared it was moving our way, but would occasionally fade out, then it seemed to move away from us. i did manage to take a picture and some video this time. the object was quite a distance from me. the light was fairly steady but would fade on occasion, before moving out of my sight.

this did take place and was visible for about 35 - 40 minutes.
content.summary: Red/orange/white light

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside to smoke a cigarette. i looked up and saw 4 airplanes in the sky. two to the north and two to the south. i was thinking about the people on board and where they were going. i looked back to the north at the two planes, which you could see smoke coming from the planes. then a perfect metal orb came from the north moving crazy fast. no smoke no sound and very close. the sun was going down and hit the orb as it moved,  it reflected the light and i saw it was a perfect metal orb. it moved so fast that it took about 4 to 5 seconds to move out of site. i was shocked to see this orb moving fast in a straight line while 4 planes were in the sky at the same time...Crazy. this happened in memphis indiana, nov, 10th at 5:10pm.
content.summary: Perfect metal orb, flying much faster than the planes in the sky with it. no smoke or sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio looking south over my back lawn. the object was immediately noticeable and drew the attention of myself and two of my friends that were with me. the three of us immediately said it was a ufo. the object was a blue disc that emitted a small cone of light from the bottom, though the cone was only a few feet lower than the object. it came from above my house, moving in an exact south-east alignment before abruptly darting south and disappearing. the whole encounter only lasted about 3 seconds. as soon as i saw it i couldn't take my eyes off it, and immediately after the hair stood up on my arms and neck and the three of us couldn't believe what we just saw. at first i was confused and panicking, then became somewhat fearful and felt as if something else was going to happen, though nothing ever did.
content.summary: Blue disc of light moved from above my house then changed direction quickly.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at the park playing with my grandpa and sister. i first noticed the object when it started to get very bright outside and my phone started to buzz when i was having no calls or nothing. at first i thought it was a weather balloon before all those weird and strange things started to happen.The object looked like a weather balloon on steroids. it moved mostly forward and hovered. i was in complete shock and surprise. i tried to take a picture but it was moving to fast. i lost sight of the object when it zipped on past the horizon.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It flew faster than any airplane or helicopter i have ever seen

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out back in our yard with my daughter. i noticed a bright red, non- pulsating, circular light coming over the tree line. i watched closely since it was so bright and there was no flashing as an airplane would do as we view aircraft regularly living where we do. as i told her to turn around and look, several other (approx. 3-4) objects started coming into view over the tree line that looked exactly the same. they were getting closer and you could see even more coming over the tree line. we went out front to see them as they flew overhead and there were neighbors out witnessing the same thing. as they flew overhead, there was zero sound emitted from any of them, and as they got directly over us, they seemed to just disappear. in total, there was probably 15-20 objects, all witnessed by several neighbors. we got some video from an iphone which is not very good quality, but very interesting. the objects flew in a straight path, but changed positions abruptly, in almost a very wide triangular formation. the first and the last object that came over was much brighter than the others in between. we live fairly close (approx 25 miles) to a major airport and a military base and observe a lot of aircraft from both, but these were something we've never seen before.
content.summary: Several round red craft coming in waves, zero sound even when directly overhead, witnessed by several neighbors

content.detailedDescription:
I had just stepped out of the hair dressers after my kid got a haircut. i was waiting for my kid and saw one of the barbers point at the sky. so i looked.

the thing moved slowly and steadily east to west. it was glowing bright red and the shape of the light was roundish. it was dark so i could be wrong about many things. it might as well have been the satellite that is supposed to crash into the earth, but that's not supposed to happen till tomorrow. it's not like anything i have ever seen before. i'm sure it was not an aircraft. the lights did not blink and this seemed too big, slow and noiseless to be an aircraft. it seems to have a shape behind the light it. i saw the rear outline just when it disappeared beyond the building behind me.
content.summary: Bright red glowing object moving slowly and steadily

content.detailedDescription:
I was out walking with my girlfriend and her dog tonight in o'fallon missouri.  the sky was cloudless, with nice star viewing.  i was looking up at the stars while she was watching the dog doing what dogs do when i noticed an object moving through the night sky at approx 11:40pm (plus or minus 15 minutes), saturday november 9th.  i first noticed it because it was blocking out the stars as it moved.  

the object was completely unlit, and was quite dark - although not as dark as the blackness of the sky itself.  i could clearly make out its boomerang v shape as it passed above me, since it was slightly lighter than the background.  it was not easy to see, extremely subtle, and would be easily missed.  it was silent.  it moved at the same speed and in the same unwavering direction the entire time i watched it.  i was able to track it for less than one minute.  it moved from roughly north to south across the sky, and was nearly directly overhead as it passed me.  its course would have been roughly parallel to highway k in o'fallon, mo, the nearest large road to my viewing location.

i did not get a chance to view its entire course across the sky, i first noticed it perhaps halfway up from the horizon as it approached me and then lost it in a similar position as it passed into the distance.  as it crossed over me it's "apparent size" from my location was very similar to holding one of the 2 or 3 inch matchbox type airplanes out at arms length above me.  due to the way it blended in so very well with the night sky i lost it from my sight well before it reached the horizon.  it was impossible for me to tell how big it was or how high due to a lack of scale reference to it. 

when i first noticed it i thought it was a large bird or owl hovering in the sky hunting, however that impression did not last.  as it approached closer i thought perhaps it was a kite or odd shaped balloon floating slowly by.  none of these impressions lasted more than a few seconds though.  it was clear well before it was overhead though that it was neither an animal nor an object floating in the wind.  the object was a squared off "v" shaped aerial machine.  the angle of the "v" was wide, perhaps as much as 120 degrees.  it was a narrow, if you want an approx of its appearance/shape/scale then imagine two black 12 inch rulers pinned together at a wide angle.  

i commented something like "what the $#$%@! is that?!" after looking at it a few seconds, and continued to verbally express my incomprehension of what this object was.  i pointed it out to my girlfriend but she could not locate it in the sky.  

the closest aerial vehicle that i know in comparison to what i saw would be the northrop b2 bomber, which are stationed in central missouri, and i have seen them in flight before.  however, given the actual size of a b2 vs the relative size of the object i saw, the engine noise would have been extreme.  also the object i saw did not have an apparent engine section extension added to the "boomerang" body shape, like the b2 has.
content.summary: Large dark boomerang object flying parallel to highway k in o'fallon mo
